channel.title: Community on OSPO++
channel.description: Recent content in Community on OSPO++

item.title: US Open Source Policy
item.description: The Open Source Policy Roundtable The Policy Roundtable is a neutral, non-partisan, group of experts in different fields focused on working through the policy implications of Open Source in the US, hosted by the Institute of Applied Open Source at Johns Hopkins University.

item.title: Community
item.description: The center of OSPO++ is our working groups - recurring meetings where we share how we’re building open source program offices (OSPOs), where we collaborate on new initiatives, where we form a community of like-minded open source practitioners, and where we support each other’s efforts.
